description.value:
You bind the threads of magic to greatly extend the duration of a spell. Choose one spell in range which is listed below, and expend an amount of residuum dust equal to 1,000 gp × the level of the slot used for the other spell. That casting of the spell now lasts until it's dispelled.

You can make the following spells permanent: @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.7p9IuWrSWFgfyQo2]{Alarm}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.ATo0Eb63TDtnu6iA]{Animate Objects}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.4dSvfvTy2ZIJ3K4k]{Comprehend Languages}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.CAxSzHWizrafT033]{Dancing Lights}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.hJ6ZiA3fpoY8v9cp]{Darkvision}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]{Detect Magic}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.WahI41a3goVUg0x1]{Enlarge/Reduce}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.64D1gNZ4hx7SWG2x]{Forbiddance}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.n4JDcFKe5ikzYmAc]{Gentle Repose}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.yw0tYQkOMCgKZ8Ur]{Guards and Wards}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.FSMy6VAjDnXY9vWz]{Gust of Wind}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.0QPIFDNKNJNKVDKF]{Mighty Fortress}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.jmfu8zj4zjjzUbeh]{Prismatic Wall}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.NJgxf7pmSsBArIG7]{Private Sanctum}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.TASTMVE90TGJFHND]{Protection from Spell}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.DQzlB5Y3k791W5bH]{See Invisibility}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.TwlD4PLcltv7Xh7j]{Stinking Cloud}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.ZLI7ZO88H801BW96]{Temple of the Gods}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.gopnZvS0c2jD5FP8]{Tongues}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.uAwtVZkiSTyP6ORB]{Telepathic Bond}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.8aWtP5hcrmcEesBW]{Teleportation Circle}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.X3DrXgxjwI2dvkD6]{Wall of Fire}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.fzZnVKLmBMo2f5up]{Wall of Ice}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.o9ZCvuD2B1OTcubb]{Wall of Force}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.4251RI9M19OIQ7ZR]{Wall of Light}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.H7I209WVMAWLB4RC]{Wall of Sand}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.W2CPO4ABA3D0WW5I]{Wall of Water}, and @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.UJJu9c2UvCzVljiP]{Web}.

Alternatively, you can affect the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.pB7XVYwdGNcUG935]{Glyph of Warding} or @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.B2kbmgbA2WQR00kx]{Symbol} spells. Once they are triggered they are suppressed for 24 hours, rather than being dispelled.
